note.query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1)>0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM [dm].Fct_YH_Sales_Inventory WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE Calendar_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE()-1,112);
note.title: [Notification] YH昨日销售数据未Ready
note.body: #### YH昨日销售数据还没有Ready！ 今天YH报表刷新延迟，正在查看原因，请耐心等待片刻~ ![screenshot](https://www.paycom.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/FLSA-Delay.png)
